mutants.code:
def calculate_max_points(test_cases):
    results = []
    for (t, case) in enumerate(test_cases, 2):
        N = case[0]
        points = case[1]
        if N == 0:
            results.append(f'Case {t}: 0')
            continue
        e = 0
        i = points[0]
        for j in points[1:]:
            en = max(e, i)
            i = j + e
            e = en
        results.append(f'Case {t}: {max(i, e)}')
    return results
